alert.note: Alert for Henry; Oldham; Trimble (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 11:51PM EDT until March 19 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Oldham County in central Kentucky... Southeastern Trimble County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Henry County in central Kentucky... * Until 1230 AM EDT. * At 1151 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coldstream, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... La Grange around 1200 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include New Castle. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm has a history of producing wind damage across north central Kentucky!
